overview:
After 2 years travelling for my studies (North America, Lyon, Manchester), I finally decided to settle for a time in Montreal to make my end of studies within the Seevibes startups.

My experiences abroad and the double degree that I did at Manchester Metropolitan University in partnership with IFAG Lyon allowed me to be very comfortable in English and get some opening mind very valuable in my work.

Always been fascinated by new technology and thanks to my profesional experiences, I naturally specialize myself in communication, particularly online communication (blogs, social media …).
